00033 #ifndef LBANN_OPTIMIZER_HPP
00034 #define LBANN_OPTIMIZER_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00037 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"
00038 #include <vector>
00039 #include <string>
00040 
00041 namespace lbann
00042 {
00043   class Optimizer {
00044   public:
00045     Optimizer() {}
00046     virtual ~Optimizer() {}
00047     // virtual Optimizer *create_optimizer() {};
00048     virtual void setup(int input_dims, int num_neurons) {}
00049     virtual void update_weight_bias_matrix(ElMat &WB_D, ElMat& WB);
00051     virtual float get_learning_rate() const { return 0.0f; }
00053     virtual void set_learning_rate(float _lr) {}
00054     virtual bool saveToCheckpoint(int fd, const char* filename, uint64_t* bytes) {
00055       return false;
00056     }
00057     virtual bool loadFromCheckpoint(int fd, const char* filename, uint64_t* bytes) {
00058       return false;
00059     }
00060     virtual bool saveToCheckpointShared(const char* dir, int Index, uint64_t* bytes) {
00061       return false;
00062     }
00063     virtual bool loadFromCheckpointShared(const char* dir, int Index, uint64_t* bytes) {
00064       return false;
00065     }
00066 
00067   public:
00068   };
00069 
00070   class Optimizer_factory {
00071   public:
00072     Optimizer_factory() {}
00073     virtual ~Optimizer_factory() {}
00074     virtual Optimizer *create_optimizer(matrix_format format=matrix_format::MC_MR) { return nullptr; };
00075 
00076   };
00077 }

00079 #endif // LBANN_OPTIMIZER_HPP
